excerpt: "Virtual Machine (VM) bursting is now available for the following virtual machines: Dsv4, Dasv4, Ddsv4, Esv4, Easv4, Edsv4, Fsv2 and B-series virtual machines. VM bursting enables customersâ€™ workloads to handle unforeseen disk traffic spikes smoothly without the need to overprovision their virtual machine."
